nodes.text: Star Wars: Rogue One: A Junior Novel

Star Wars: Rogue One: A Junior Novel is the junior novelization of the film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. It was written by Matt Forbeck and originally published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press in eBook format on December 16, 2016.

A subsequent hardcover edition was released in the United States on March 28, 2017, while Egmont UK Ltd published a paperback edition in the United Kingdom on April 6, 2017. The US edition includes eight bonus pages of color photos from the film.
Relive the excitement of Rogue One with this junior novelization that retells the film! Features eight pages of color photos.
